title: Add "@" button on the titlebar to provide feedback on the spot
body: As for the "?" button on windows to access the help manual, a "@" button would allow developers to receive feedback from final users. It would work both for Microsoft, e.g. Windows 10, and for third party applications.

comments.body: as the "?" button, the "@" should allow to point to an element in the application, so that comment can be attached to specific items in the user interface
